info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:24PM EDT until May 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL HARNETT AND CENTRAL JOHNSTON COUNTIES... At 424 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dunn, or 10 miles east of Lillington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Dunn, Benson, Micro, Selma, Erwin, Coats, Four Oaks, Pine Level and Princeton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
